articles.title: Bolivia cuts ties with Israel; other Latin American countries recall envoys - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Countries blame Israel’s ‘disproportionate’ attack on Gaza and reiterate calls for a humanitarian ceasefire.
articles.content:
Bolivia has cut official ties with Israel over the war in Gaza as two other Latin American countries recalled their ambassadors in Tel Aviv for consultations.
